captions.text:
NARRATOR: People are getting
killed in Karachi every day.

There's gang violence, tons of
mafia, sectarian killings, and

in more recent years,
suicide bombings.

But for the political parties,
it's a massive turf war.

And while politicians and
businessmen would never admit

that they engage in
assassinating their rivals,

someone is hiring the so-called
target killers.

We wanted to interview one of
the men responsible for this

dirty work, so we arranged a
meeting with a target killer.

It was uncomfortable for
everyone involved.

We negotiated the terms
of the interview--

in a moving car and with his
motorcycle helmet on.

And not surprisingly, the guy
who kills people for money--

It's been at my feet
the whole time.

MALE SPEAKER: Well,
that was intense.

yeah, that was really strange
sitting next to someone who's

And you could just tell from
his demeanor and from his
eyes, he was a hard dude.

And there's 600 guys like that
roaming around the city.

Anytime anyone has a beef to
settle with someone else--

they want to kill them-- just
hire one of these guys and

don't pay them that
much money, and

It's lawless, wild,
and chaotic here.
And that is some scary shit.

comments.text:
This is what can happen if you are white:
It's the hood. You know your white ass sticks out like a sore thumb. You 
are weak. You are treated like shit. You are beaten because you are a 
"Bitch". You get jumped in the middle of the street. You are the prime 
target for your ruthless peers. Until one day while getting your daily 
jumping you hear "GET OFF THAT LIL NIGGA, BITCH" and your Attackers scatter 
and you look up too see the Glock holding, Red bandana wearing, protectors 
hand and he says "Get up those MOTHERFUCKAS will be back with they guns" so 
you get up and walk off with your new found friend. Fast forward through 
all the "get to know each other" shit and now you 2 are homies and he 
starts askin favors that you, without hesitation, accept because you are 
forever in his debt. So you start getting into this new life. Start making 
new "Friends" but stay loyal to your homie. The money starts to roll in. 
The drugs start to become what gets you through your day. And the FEAR you 
strike in people when your bug eyed cracker ass walks down the street is 
FUCKING AMAZING. And that's when your homie says "You're ready my wigga" 
and he brings you to and abandoned project. Ware 20 men stand in a half 
circle all with that red bandanna. Your boy turns to you and says "You 
ready?" And you know what this is. You know what he's offering. A family. 
Lifelong friends. PEOPLE WHOVE GOT YOUR BACK. So you nod and you March in 
the middle of that circle. Ware one raises his phone and yells "INITIATION 
TIME MOTHER FUCKERS" and they each kick the shit OUTA you for 30 seconds. 
You are now sworn into your new found family. You are handed that red 
bandana, and a piece with "Blood run thicker, and gets you richer" carved 
into it. So as you walk down the street with your new colors you see these 
fucking assholes kicking the shit out of some fucking ginger. So you scream 
"YO BACK THE FUCK UP BOTH OF YOU!" And they scramble and you pick that 
ginger bitch off the ground... And the cycle repeats
﻿

comments.text:
ive met a killer once in my life. he was renting an apartement together 
with a friend of mine in bangkok. he was quite a religious guy, pretty calm 
and relaxed considering his line of work. my friend told me he did it for 
his family and was involved in some of shootings that occured durning the 
big red/yellow protest. two months after i left, my friend found him shot 
dead in the apartement, he told me the police did it after he completed a 
job for them, apparantly..but who knows. the political situation over there 
is insane. but its unfair to say professions like that are a result of 
poverty. while true to some extent...our society will always have the need 
for hitman. the profession is as old as prostitution, wich is considered 
"the oldest business". we will always have ppl doing the dirty work. its 
just sad that ppl who hire them (big CEO's, politicians, bankers) dont go 
for quality ..they just give some poor guy 1000 bucks or even less. usually 
the guy ends up dead or in jail. also the most succesfull and best paid 
killers are the ones working for government institutions like cia or some 
other organization we've never even heard about. and the most usable and 
openly accepted killers are in the army. where they tell you to fight for 
freedom, while killing civilians and stealing ressources.﻿
comments.author: v00d00child187

comments.text:
People, c'mon, just because he's an assassin doesn't mean he's going to be 
ripped and walking around in all black with tactical gear or anything like 
that. Most hit men look like normal, every day people, and most also are 
like this guy. They get into the business because it seems like a good 
option and then they can't get out and end up either getting killed or 
suffering mental issues. These guys are simple hitmen in the middle of a 
war torn country. It's not like they're James Bond or CIA type guys like 
you see in the movies.﻿
